PackageOracle.name: DA_SERVICE_ADDRESS_VANTAGE_XRE
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_SERVICE_ADDRESS_VANTAGE_XRE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.16.258090000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,hs_key IN VARCHAR2
,address_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,hs_key IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_service_address_vantage_xre;

body.name: DA_SERVICE_ADDRESS_VANTAGE_XRE
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_SERVICE_ADDRESS_VANTAGE_XRE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.16.268281000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,hs_key IN VARCHAR2
,address_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_service_address_vantage_xre.add, parms=' || hs_key || '|' || address_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_service_address_vantage_xref a
(
a.hs_key
,a.address_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.hs_key
,add.address_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_service_address_vantage_xre.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,hs_key IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_service_address_vantage_xre.del, parms=' || hs_key || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_service_address_vantage_xref a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.hs_key = del.hs_key
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_service_address_vantage_xre.del');

END del;

END da_service_address_vantage_xre;
